004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command;
006
007import static edu.wpi.first.math.trajectory.TrapezoidProfile.State;
008import static edu.wpi.first.util.ErrorMessages.requireNonNullParam;
009
010import edu.wpi.first.math.trajectory.TrapezoidProfile;
011import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Timer;
012import java.util.function.Consumer;
013import java.util.function.Supplier;
014
015/**
016 * A command that runs a {@link TrapezoidProfile}. Useful for smoothly controlling mechanism motion.
017 *
018 * <p>This class is provided by the NewCommands VendorDep
019 */
020public class TrapezoidProfileCommand extends Command {
021  private final TrapezoidProfile m_profile;
022  private final Consumer<State> m_output;
023  private final Supplier<State> m_goal;
024  private final Supplier<State> m_currentState;
025  private final Timer m_timer = new Timer();
026
027  /**
028   * Creates a new TrapezoidProfileCommand that will execute the given {@link TrapezoidProfile}.
029   * Output will be piped to the provided consumer function.
030   *
031   * @param profile The motion profile to execute.
032   * @param output The consumer for the profile output.
033   * @param goal The supplier for the desired state
034   * @param currentState The current state
035   * @param requirements The subsystems required by this command.
036   */
037  @SuppressWarnings("this-escape")
038  public TrapezoidProfileCommand(
039      TrapezoidProfile profile,
040      Consumer<State> output,
041      Supplier<State> goal,
042      Supplier<State> currentState,
043      Subsystem... requirements) {
044    m_profile = requireNonNullParam(profile, "profile", "TrapezoidProfileCommand");
045    m_output = requireNonNullParam(output, "output", "TrapezoidProfileCommand");
046    m_goal = goal;
047    m_currentState = currentState;
048    addRequirements(requirements);
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  public void initialize() {
053    m_timer.restart();
054  }
055
056  @Override
057  @SuppressWarnings("removal")
058  public void execute() {
059    m_output.accept(m_profile.calculate(m_timer.get(), m_currentState.get(), m_goal.get()));
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  public void end(boolean interrupted) {
064    m_timer.stop();
065  }
066
067  @Override
068  public boolean isFinished() {
069    return m_timer.hasElapsed(m_profile.totalTime());
070  }
071}
